resources.string: "Strategy game\n" "Board contains 25 squares. And for every player 12 Rocks. " "In your turn press on one Rock and select one of four directions. " "Directions are: up, down, left, right. " "Rock can move to new position only if it's empty. " "Move is one step. " "Press end turn if you done, or undo to reset last move. "

"Unlike move, jump is two steps. " "When opponents Rock is on the next position to your Rock, " "and their is an empty position in the same direction after " "opponents Rock, you can move/jump. " "After jump, the opponents Rock will be removed from play."
"Rock can jump multiple times in one turn.\n" "It can be in one directionâ€¦"
"Last one standing wins!\n" "Unless one or both players has five or less Rocks, " "and the countdown reach zero, then it's draw.\n" "Ready to try?"
